example_comparison.comment: This article, focusing on MicroStrategy's Bitcoin sales, is entirely unrelated to the reference article about U.S. tariffs. The subjects (cryptocurrency sale vs. international trade policy) and entities involved (MicroStrategy vs. Trump/government) are completely different.
